narrative.narrative: Azzurra Air was a mostly charter airline arond from operations start in December 1996 until March 2004. Its only scheduled flight was from Bergamo near Milan to Rome. The rest were charters to places around the Mediterranean like Spain and Greece and other places in Europe like Portugal,the Netherlands and the UK. At the end its fleet had four 737-700's,two A320-200's,and about seven BAe 146-200 types including RJ70 and RJ85's. It also had five A320s on order. The airline was a joint venture between the 51% owner Air International Services, an Italian investment group, and Air Malta the 49% owner.
